line.comment: * stop all current wars and get extra reputation
* perm wars against all major factions
* all player outposts level up in production efficiency
* highest possible bonus is 10%. It degrades when you own more than 4 outposts
* there is a final cap if some players have raised max production spec in the t-file too much
* 1 Favor point is needed but never gets consumed

sval.val: stop all current wars and get extra reputation
perm wars against all major factions
all player outposts level up in production efficiency
highest possible bonus is 10%. It degrades when you own more than 4 outposts
there is a final cap if some players have raised max production spec in the t-file too much
1 Favor point is needed but never gets consumed
